popularityCurve.label: tuneview is unique it's unlike any ipod remote that you've used before

clusterList.phrase: tuneview is unique it's unlike any ipod remote that you've used before
tuneview features a color lcd screen that lets you remotely view the contents of your ipod and control playback allowing you to manage the ipod as if it were in your hands
both the tuneview dock and tuneview remote are usb devices that can be updated via a firmware download just like an ipod
over time keyspan will release firmware updates that will add new capabilities to tuneview
